names.name: Mitznefet
names.note: This is a type of hat thing

manufacturing.notes: I get the impressions that they farm out most of their textile manufacturing to subcontractors. There's probably a location in Thailand. They do make Berry compliant gear but I don't know whether that Berry compliant stuff includes textiles.

manufacturing.note: They're location in Holon Israel seems to be mostly high level people. Manufacturing is probably all done elsewhere. They're a private company so subcontractors aren't readily available.
